title: Does anyone know the font from the cover of Guitar Hero 3 video game?
content:
Hello All,  
I am trying to find the font that was used on the cover of the video game guitar hero 3, I have seen it on some other things so I don’t think it is custom.  
Thanks for any help.

z

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [guitarhero3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152631/http:/typophile.com/files/guitarhero3.jpg) | 17.69 KB |

 [‹ Help with company logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152631/http:/www.typophile.com/node/52154 "Go to previous forum topic") [hudson bay again... please help with typeface id ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152631/http:/www.typophile.com/node/52184 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zfish7

comments.content: I _do_ think this is custom, but you never know. :^)

I had heard that Scott Campbell, tattoo artist to the stars, was doing artwork for Guitar Hero 3, though I’m not sure this is his work.

He is responsible for the amazing Camel posters that you see in the windows of many delis here in NY.

[http://www.sailorjerry.com/hype.php?entry=221](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152631/http:/www.sailorjerry.com/hype.php?entry=221 "http://www.sailorjerry.com/hype.php?entry=221")
Thanks for the info, I will have to just make it.

I dont think its custom. I had the same question and googled it and someone said that Nightmare Hero by Laurent Mouy was it.

It is very similar

[http://www.dafont.com/nightmare-hero.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152631/http:/www.dafont.com/nightmare-hero.font "http://www.dafont.com/nightmare-hero.font")

hope it helps, but maybe too late, eh?

I don’t think the logo was based on this font - it’s the other way around.

- Lex
